listitem.para: T.Asano. An efficient algorithm for finding the visibility polygon for a polygonal region with holes. IEICE Transactions (1976-1990), (9):557559, 1985.

D.T. Lee. Visibility of a simple polygon. Computer Vision, Graphics, and Image Processing, 22:207221, 1983.
